quote: Bravery without forethought, causes a man to fight blindly and desperately like a mad bull.Â  Such an opponent, must not be encountered with brute force, but may be lured into an ambush and slain.
quote_letters: BRAVERY WITHOUT FORETHOUGHT CAUSES A MAN TO FIGHT BLINDLY AND DESPERATELY LIKE A MAD BULL SUCH AN OPPONENT MUST NOT BE ENCOUNTERED WITH BRUTE FORCE BUT MAY BE LURED INTO AN AMBUSH AND SLAIN
source: Sun Tzu, The Art of War
